vcmo_schedule_form_field_1: H-t-H survey & VCT activity done as per micro-plan
vcmo_schedule_form_field_2: Presence of all workers at field as per Micro-plan
vcmo_schedule_form_field_3: House hold left during H-t-H survey & VCT activity
vcmo_schedule_form_field_6: If yes, counselling at household level done
vcmo_schedule_form_field_7: H-t-H survey workers entered household & checked all containers
vcmo_schedule_form_field_8: Source reduction of all identified pile up garbage done by VCT
vcmo_schedule_form_field_9: De-clogging of all identified blocked drain
vcmo_schedule_form_field_10: Larvicide spraying at all identified low land & unmanaged construction sites
vcmo_schedule_form_field_11: Conduction of Larvicide spraying as per guideline
vcmo_schedule_form_field_12: Issuing notice to the owners of water bodies, closed establishment, vacant land identified by H-t-H teams
vcmo_schedule_form_field_13: Service of notices to all State Government & Central Government offices & apartments
vcmo_schedule_form_field_14: Fine imposed by ULBs in case of non-compliance by office & apartments
vcmo_schedule_form_field_15: Meeting organised with President/Secretary of resident welfare associations
vcmo_schedule_form_field_16: Follow up of all identified fever (dengue/malaria) cases done by Health Worker
vcmo_schedule_form_field_17: Suspected fever cases tested for Dengue, Malaria
vcmo_schedule_form_field_19: Display of dengue related poster/banner/flex at community level
vcmo_schedule_form_field_20: Release of guppy fish in clean & stagnant water
vcmo_schedule_form_field_21: Action taken for entomological alert generation
